name: KHAOS (pikachurian)
description:
You play as hercules trying to save Greese from the Romans by teaming up with the Greek god Khaos.  Get to the exit gate to complete each level.

This game was made for Brackeys 2021 2 Gamejam.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to rotate

Left-click to punch

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to dash.  Hold w, a, s, or d when pressing shift to move that way.  If you jump after dashing on the ground you will travel farther.

Q to grab and throw

Mouse wheel or numbers to switch equipped weapon.  (1 through 4)

ESC (escape) to brings you to the main menu.  Press ESC again to quit the program.

Knocking out enemies gives you glory, but knocking out enemies with other enemies or items give you even more glory!
